sys_script.name: Import Candidates Q&A

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_e092b94d1b4425101f602f08b04bcbf9
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>false</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_431105_cand_ass_assessment</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_431105_cand_ass_assessment">stateCHANGESFROM10^EQ<item display_value="Application" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESFROM" or="false" value="10"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Import Candidates Q&A</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var assessment = current.sys_id; var NOT_ELIGIBLE = '30'; var caUtils = new CandidateAssessmentUtils(); var grCandidate = new GlideRecord(caUtils.CANDIDATE_TABLE); grCandidate.addQuery('assessment', assessment); //grCandidate.addQuery('state', '!=', NOT_ELIGIBLE); grCandidate.query(); while (grCandidate.next()) { caUtils.copyAssessmentSCInCandidate(assessment, grCandidate.sys_id); caUtils.populateCandidateQA(assessment, grCandidate.sys_id); grCandidate.state = caUtils.IN_ELIGIBILITY; grCandidate.update(); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-12-26 23:06:22</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>e092b94d1b4425101f602f08b04bcbf9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Import Candidates Q&A</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Talent NOW" source="x_431105_cand_ass">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Talent NOW">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_e092b94d1b4425101f602f08b04bcbf9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-21 15:05:43</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e092b94d1b4425101f602f08b04bcbf9"/> </record_update>
